content.text:
# Czech Republic women's national handball team

The '''Czech Republic women's national handball team''' is the national team of the Czech Republic. Before 1994, it was a part of the  Czechoslovakia women's national handball team.
Results
Olympic Games
The Czech Republic has never appeared at the Olympic Games and has yet to qualify.

Current squad

Head coach: Bent Dahl
